name: Eleanor Wychwood
description: A charismatic socialite with ties to the city's underworld, rumored to be searching for a powerful artifact.

communication.mannerisms: Bubbly and flirtatious, with a tendency to be overly dramatic
keyPhrases: You have no idea what I've been through.

connections: Acquaintance of a prominent crime lord
Former lover of a powerful vampire

questUtility: Social Butterfly (can charm NPCs for information)

uniqueFeatures: A rare blood birthmark on her left cheek
appearance.wardrobe: Glamorous evening gowns and designer accessories
appearance.bodyLanguage: Often uses sweeping gestures when speaking

behaviorTriggers.trigger: Player shows genuine concern for her well-being

hintsAndClues: Discovers a cryptic message on an invitation card from a mysterious benefactor
Uncovering rumors about Eleanor's past, hinting at a traumatic event

progression.evolution: If the player helps her uncover the truth behind her blood birthmark, she gains access to exclusive underworld connections.
progression.potentialBetrayal: If the player betrays her trust, Eleanor may turn against them with dark magic abilities.
